ing: 2 fluid ounces grapefruit-flavored soda (such as SquirtÂ®), or more to taste
des: "I love mixing cocktails. This is a sweet refreshing cocktail that tastes like coconut lemonade. If you like stronger drinks, double the brandy."
ins: Fill a low-ball glass with ice. Pour coconut rum and peach brandy over ice. Top with grapefruit-flavored soda; squeeze lime over soda. Stir.
